attributes.action: legalise cannabis: A step to peace an understanding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to relax the cannabis laws would save police at the very least £38m (The equivilant to 500 fulltime officers) a year and vastly improve police and community relations.
In this day and age there is no logical reason why cannibas sativa should remain outlawed.
Privatising the cannabis market would takes millions of pounds away from dangerous street gangs.If cannabis was legal violent crime would drop significantly,cannibas is used appropriatley is brilliant for self examination and it releases anxiety,it should not be illegal anymore than cigarettes should be illegal.This petition will change hundreds of thousands of lives all over the country,this is a step towards peace,understanding a better safer britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
